title: [D5] Currently LF> Serious, Talented Top Laner
body:
For those who might not know me already, I've been in the scene for quite some time in the past and I'm trying to make my return next year. Our team is actively looking for a top laner who is committed and talented/experienced.

Current Team Lineup:
- D5 Heavenz
- First Mate
- D5 MiraClz
- D5 Fractal

Our current 4 players have been playing together since the start of March 2015, and we are aiming to get into the OPL next year.

Contact me through facebook inbox if you are interested: https://www.facebook.com/HeavenzCurse

EDIT:
Also, I've set up a chatroom, "D5"  in the game client if you want to get in touch with anyone on the team when we're online.
